text:
Also- I have nothing. You keep talking about the attorney stuff like we are having an active conversation. I keep telling you itâ€™s not active. We can
discuss that too. Please follow through.
Message 3498 of 4024
It has been five hours since we agreed to discuss the kids. I worked my day around your work schedule, just as you asked. Please give me a ring, and we
can have the discussion we agreed on.
Please do not inflame what is already a very hostile situation. I am asking to work with you on the here and now, not the back to school fall plan.
Waiting on the attorneys got us what today? Zero.
Please call, and we can cut it short if we can't make progress, but I'm all in for the kids.
Sent:07/08/2024 at 05:51 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Re: Kids This Week
Message 3499 of 4024
Hey-
You called but refused to talk about anything related to the kids. All you did was fight and make accusations. You even piled on about Lisa's
testimony. I am trying to ask you to stop fighting all the time and think about the kids.
Every single call is all your personal agenda. You just can't help yourself. Even for a moment. May we please have the call I asked for instead of you
screaming about Lisa? I don't really care to discuss that. I only care about my kids.
Is there anything on earth I can do to persuade you to think about Max and Adrian? Anything?
